about_the_game:
The demo for the horror game "Seek" includes only the first and second floors of the orphan院 from the full version. In this unique survival horror game, classical music intertwines with psychological terror to create a suffocatingly eerie atmosphere. You play as Alice, an ordinary girl who wakes up to find herself trapped in a constantly shifting, bizarre world. An orphanage covered in ice, monsters lurking in the shadows, and intricate puzzles—every step is filled with danger and the unknown.

To survive, you must gather supplies, evade pursuit, and uncover the secrets hidden in the darkness. But as the truth gradually comes to light, will you be able to endure the brutal reality behind it all?
detailed_description:
The demo for the horror game "Seek" includes only the first and second floors of the orphan院 from the full version. In this unique survival horror game, classical music intertwines with psychological terror to create a suffocatingly eerie atmosphere. You play as Alice, an ordinary girl who wakes up to find herself trapped in a constantly shifting, bizarre world. An orphanage covered in ice, monsters lurking in the shadows, and intricate puzzles—every step is filled with danger and the unknown.

To survive, you must gather supplies, evade pursuit, and uncover the secrets hidden in the darkness. But as the truth gradually comes to light, will you be able to endure the brutal reality behind it all?
name: Seek Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10 or Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 (1GB) or AMD Radeon HD 6570 (1GB)
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10 or Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB)
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Headphones recommended

short_description: The "Seek" demo features the orphanage's first two floors. Play as Alice, trapped in a twisted, hostile world. Survive by gathering supplies, evading monsters, and solving puzzles. But as the truth unfolds, can you face the harsh reality, or remain trapped in this endless nightmare?
